data.title: CR8 Creative Sampler
data.meta_description: CR8 takes everything fun about sampling, and puts it all inside a fast, easy workflow. Turn any sound into an inspiring instrument, with quick access to 8 sample layers, 5 stretching algorithms, drag-and-drop modulators and more.
data.text:
Ideal for beats, looping, instrument creation, sound design, and more, CR8 makes sampling easy and fun—just drag in a sample, and start playing. Or, take your creativity to the max: stretch, loop, sync, layer, stack, freeze, reverse, modulate, and use analog synth modules to process your sounds.

Take advantage of the vast collection of over 2500 free samples and over 800 presets—CR8 pairs with the AI-powered COSMOS Sample Finder, so you can find any sound you want in seconds.
